```{r}
library("tidyverse")
library("kableExtra")
library("brms")
library("emmeans")
library("tidybayes")

mod <- brm(mpg ~ s(wt), data = mtcars, file = here::here("misc", "mod"))
set.seed(2023)

post <- mod %>% 
  emmeans(specs = ~ wt, 
    at = list(wt = seq(0.9, 6.1, length.out = 50)), 
    epred = TRUE) 

post %>% 
  gather_emmeans_draws() %>% 
  filter(.draw %in% 1:80) %>% 
  ggplot(., aes(x = wt, y = .value)) + 
  geom_line(aes(group = .draw, x = wt, y = .value), linewidth = 0.75, alpha = 0.1) + 
  geom_point(data = mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg), color = "white", size = 2.5) + 
  geom_point(data = mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg), color = "blue", size = 2) + 
  coord_cartesian(expand = F) + 
  theme_void()
```
